data.name: War Thunder - Challenger DS Pack
data.detailed_description:
Note!

To activate this DLC for your Gaijin account, it has to be linked to Steam account that made the purchase. If you aren't sure it is, please follow the instruction. If you still have any questions, contact our support (login on the same website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Challenger DS (Rank 6 Great Britain);
  • Premium account for 15 days;
  • 2000 Golden Eagles.

Challenger DS

Challenger Mk.3 - is an improved modification of the famous British MBT, developed in the mid 1980s based on the export version of the Shir-2 tank, destined for Iran. The maximum speed of this tank model is up to 56 km/h. It is armed with a 120mm L11A5 gun, the ammunition includes APFSDS, HESH and smoke shells. Additionally, the tank comes equipped with two 7.62 mm machine guns, smoke grenade launchers, thermal vision for a gunner and a smoke screen.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!
  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
